Class ScoreService

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.score.ScoreService
public class ScoreService extends Object
Service for calculating and applying scoring based on game actions. Implements the scoring formula: base points = 50 * lines^2, multiplied by (1 + combo). Awards points for soft drops (1 point per cell) and hard drops (2 points per cell).

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the score and lines cleared count.

    • applySoftDrop

      public void applySoftDrop(MoveEvent event)
      Applies scoring for a soft drop (manual downward movement). Awards 1 point per cell moved, only if the move was user-initiated.
      Parameters:
      event - The move event containing information about the drop

    • applyHardDrop

      public void applyHardDrop(int distance)
      Applies scoring for a hard drop (instant drop to bottom). Awards 2 points per cell dropped.
      Parameters:
      distance - The number of rows the brick was dropped

    • applyLineClearBonus

      public void applyLineClearBonus(ClearRow cleared)
      Applies scoring for line clears using the formula: 50 * lines^2 * (1 + combo). Also increments the combo counter and updates lines cleared count.
      Parameters:
      cleared - ClearRow object containing information about the cleared lines

    • getScore

      public Score getScore()
      Gets the Score object being managed.
      Returns:
      The Score object
